MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the KA9 postcode area of Prestwick . It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 8.30pm to safely complete repairs on an electricity pole opposite Sandyford Farm, this is following damage by a 3rd party and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7.34pm on Sunday 31st of January 2021.
